pkgmetadata.longdescription: Develop R Packages using Rust // A framework is provided to transparently develop R packages using 'Rust' https://www.rust- lang.org/ with minimal overhead, and more wrappers are easily added. Help is provided to run 'Cargo' https://doc.rust- lang.org/cargo/ in a manner consistent with CRAN policies. Rust code can also be embedded directly in an R script. The package is not official, affiliated with, nor endorsed by the Rust project.
